member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT
member.summary: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves support information for video decoding.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT.NodeIndex
member.summary: For single GPU operation, set this to zero. If there are multiple GPU nodes, set a bit to identify the node (the device's physical adapter) to which the command queue applies. Each bit in the mask corresponds to a single node. Only 1 bit may be set.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT.Configuration
member.summary: A structure specifying the decode profile, bitstream encryption, and interlace type of the source stream.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT.Width
member.summary: The decode width of the source stream.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT.Height
member.summary: The decode height of the source stream

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT.DecodeFormat
member.summary: The to use as the decode format. This format is the output format if no decoder conversion is specified.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT.FrameRate
member.summary: The frame rate of the video format. A value of 0 means the frame rate is unknown.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT.BitRate
member.summary: The average bits per second data compression rate for the compressed video stream. This information is used by the driver to determine whether the video can be decoded in real-time. A value of 0 means the bit rate is unknown.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT.SupportFlags
member.summary: A combination of values from the enumeration indicating the support for video decoding. This value is populated by the call to ID3D12Device.CheckFeatureSupport.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT.ConfigurationFlags
member.summary: A combination of values from the enumeration describing the video decode configuration. This value is populated by the call to ID3D12Device.CheckFeatureSupport.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_SUPPORT.DecodeTier
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the decoding tier of a hardware video decoder.
